hash_collections_load_imp.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_HASH_COLLECTIONS_LOAD_IMP_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_HASH_COLLECTIONS_LOAD_IMP_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 # pragma warning (disable : 4786) // too long name, harmless warning
00008 #endif
00009 
00011 // hash_collections_load_imp.hpp: serialization for loading stl collections
00012

00020 // helper function templates for serialization of hashed collections
00021 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/serialization/nvp.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/serialization/collections_load_imp.hpp>
00024 
00025 namespace boost{
00026 namespace serialization {
00027 namespace stl {
00028 
00030 // implementation of serialization for STL containers
00031 //
00032 template<class Archive, class Container, class InputFunction>
00033 inline void load_hash_collection(Archive & ar, Container &s)
00034 {
00035     s.clear();
00036     // retrieve number of elements
00037     unsigned int count;
00038     unsigned int item_version(0);
00039     unsigned int bucket_count;;
00040     ar >> BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(count);
00041     if(3 < ar.get_library_version()){
00042        ar >> BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(bucket_count);
00043        ar >> BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(item_version);
00044     }
00045     #if ! defined(__MWERKS__)
00046     s.resize(bucket_count);
00047     #endif
00048     InputFunction ifunc;
00049     while(count-- > 0){
00050         ifunc(ar, s, item_version);
00051     }
00052 }
00053 
00054 } // namespace stl 
00055 } // namespace serialization
00056 } // namespace boost
00057 
00058 #endif //BOOST_SERIALIZATION_HASH_COLLECTIONS_LOAD_IMP_HPP
